name: Sword of Legen't: Excalin't
description:
A legendary hero finds the legendary sword and ... it's missing the blade. It's time to get creative. 

Attach anything to your hilt and use it to fight off enemies on your quest to obtain the true legendary sword.

Controls: 

WASD - to move

Left Click - Pick up

Right Click - Discard

Alex Huang (@ralpph4) - Lead Programmer, additional art assets

Jake Nguyen - Lead Artist, Animator

Annabel To - Programmer

Justin Kung - Audio
